text: AmakholwaokwenenengabobakholwakuAll창hnoMthunywa waKhe kuphela, naxa bedibana naye ngemicimbi eyinzuzo kuye nakubo, bangahambi bengacelanga imvume kuye kuqala. Inene, abo bacela imvume yakho, wena (Muhammad) abo ngabo bakholwa (ngokwenene) kuAll창h nakuMthunywa waKhe. Ke kaloku xa becela imvume kuwe yemicimbi eyiyeyabo, banike. Nika imvume kulowo uthande ukumnika kubo uze ubacelele itarhu kuAll창h. Inene uAll창h nguMxoleli yaye Unenceba
